title: Adults-Only Southern Italy Five-Star Retreat with Infinity Pool Overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea
description: Surrounded by waving palms and fragrant citrus and overlooking the endless blue of Southern Italy's Coast of the Gods, Villa Paola is an adults-only, five-star Tropea escape steeped in seaside history. Inhabiting an ancient, lovingly hand-restored Franciscan monastery, this boutique hotel promises to bewitch with spectacular cliffside views from the infinity pool, ice-cold aperitifs for sipping on the rooftop terrace or sumptuous Italian at the onsite fine dining restaurant Deâ€™ Minimi.
